definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="deal_damage"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GasFilter</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GasFilter</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GasMaskCrahet.helmet</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="entity_set_armor_slot_item"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GasgasMask.helmet</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">GENERIC</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
